Pro API (Paid plans)
Guides
API Reference
Changelog
Search
CTRL-K
Search Queries
GET
https://pro-api.coingecko.com/api/v3/search

This endpoint allows you to search for coins, categories and markets listed on CoinGecko

üìò

Notes

The responses are sorted in descending order by market cap.
Cache / Update Frequency: every 15 minutes for all the API plans.
QUERY PARAMS
query
string
required

search query

RESPONSE
200

List of coins, categories and markets matching search term ordered by market cap

RESPONSE BODY
object
coins
array of objects
object
id
string

coin ID

name
string

coin name

api_symbol
string

coin api symbol

symbol
string

coin symbol

market_cap_rank
number

coin market cap rank

thumb
string

coin thumb image url

large
string

coin large image url

exchanges
array of objects
object
id
string

exchange ID

name
string

exchange name

market_type
string

exchange market type

thumb
string

exchange thumb image url

large
string

exchange large image url

icos
array of strings
categories
array of objects
object
id
string

category ID

name
string

category name

nfts
array of objects
object
id
string

NFT collection ID

name
string

NFT name

symbol
string

NFT collection symbol

thumb
string

NFT collection thumb image url

Updated about 1 month ago

BTC-to-Currency Exchange Rates
Trending
Did this page help you?
Yes
No
LANGUAGE
Shell
Node
Ruby
PHP
Python
CREDENTIALS
Header
Log in to use your API keys
CURL REQUEST
1
curl --request GET \
2
     --url https://pro-api.coingecko.com/api/v3/search \
3
     --header 'accept: application/json'
Try It!
RESPONSE
200
EXAMPLE
1
{
2
